description:
"Winter wonderland" sounds inviting, but only when you're dressed appropriately. The Methow Pants offer weather protection for activities in or around the snow. The cozy fleece interior adds serious warmth, with breathable lower legs to prevent overheating. The articulated construction and stretch fabric let you move freely, no matter what winter activity you choose.

  • Wicking polyester thigh and seat has a brushed interior for extra warmth
  • Nylon lower leg breaths well and moves sweat away from your skin
  • DWR (durable water repellent) finish for excellent waterproofness
  • UPF 50+ protection keeps harmful UV at bay
  • Adjustable internal drawcord to get the fit just right
  • Movement-mirroring stretch ensures unrestricted movement
name: Outdoor Research Methow Pants - Women's
